goal.ch: 透過介紹遙感探測原理與施測方法使學生了解衛星運動、訊號處理、光譜分類、定位導航、誤差分析，並熟稔各式測量儀器的精度與使用時機，同時具備資料收集、處理、驗證、應用等獨立操作能力。本課程將以地球科學相關應用為主軸，對於地物探勘、地質調查、水文監測、海洋遙測與皆能扮演輔助的角色。
goal.en: Provide an opportunity for students to understand the basic principle of Satellite Remote Sensing, from both lecture and hands-on practice. The lecture includes orbital mechanics, signal processing, multispectral analysis, positioning and navigation, and error analysis. Through the operation of various instrumentation in the fieldwork, students will be familiar with the data that can be applied to multiple geoscience aspects, including geophysical exploration, geological survey, hydrological monitoring, and ocean remote sensing.

outline.ch: 本課程包括原理介紹與分組實作。講授內容包括主動與被動式遙測方法。實作部份分為光譜資料處理及操作手持與固定式GPS接收機。修課學生將分組達成當週實習目標與期末口頭/書面專題報告。學期間將有不定期課堂測驗。
outline.en: This course includes lecture, hands-on practice and fieldwork. The materials covering remote sensing basics and instrumentation practice will be given both indoor and outdoor. Assessment and grading of learning performance consist of quiz, hands-on practice, assignment, and final project report (oral and written).
